import React, { Component } from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import DataGuidence from './DataGuidence'; import Contact from './Contact'; import Glossary from './Glossary'; import About from './About'; import App from './App'; class TermsConditions extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {content: "", widgets: "", ReadingRisk: false, ContentHeading: "", ContentBody: "", HideSearchBar: true, SearchText: "", SearchModal: false }; this.ContentFunc = this.ContentFunc.bind(this); this.handleClick = this.handleClick.bind(this); } handleClick(event) { switch (event) { case "Home": ReactDOM.render(, document.getElementById('root')); break; case "Glossary": ReactDOM.render(, document.getElementById('root')); break; case "About": ReactDOM.render(, document.getElementById('root')); break; case "TermsConditions": ReactDOM.render(, document.getElementById('root')); break; case "DataGuidence": ReactDOM.render(, document.getElementById('root')); break; case "Contact": ReactDOM.render(, document.getElementById('root')); break; default: break; } } ContentFunc = () => { const Base = (
Terms and Conditions Page
) return Base; } render() { return (
